ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So when We recite it, follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, as We recite it, follow its reading.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And so when We recite it, follow its recitation attentively;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When We recite it, follow its recitation (by Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when We have read it, you should thereupon follow what is read.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when We have recited it to you, then follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So, when We recite it, follow thou its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when We read it, follow thou the reading;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When We have recited it, follow its words attentively;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore when We reciteit, follow thou the reciting thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when We have recited it to you [O Muhammad SAW through Jibrael (Gabriel)], then follow you its (the Quran's) recital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When We recite it, follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:18] So, when We recite it, to you, by means of Gabriel’s recital, follow its recitation, listen to its recitation: thus the Prophet (s) would listen to it and then repeat it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when We read it) when Gabriel reads to you, (follow thou the reading) you, Muhammad, read after him; it is also said this means: what We finish composing it with all the lawful and unlawful contained therein, do you follow its composition;
